content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: RSUBJID
      operator: non_empty
    - name: RSUBJID
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: POOLID
    - name: RSUBJID
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value: $dm_usubjid
Core:
  Id: CORE-000235
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Verify that RSUBJID=DM.USUBJID when RSUBJID is populated and RSUBJID
  is not equal to POOLID
Operations:
  - domain: DM
    id: $dm_usubjid
    name: USUBJID
    operator: distinct
Outcome:
  Message: RSUBJID must equal DM.USUBJID when RSUBJID is populated and RSUBJID does
    not equal POOLID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Value
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0367
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Identifier for a related study subject or pool of
                  study subjects. The subject(s) may be human or animal. RSUBJID will
                  be populated with the USUBJID of the related subject or the POOLID
                  of the related pool. RSUBJID will be null for data about associated
                  persons who are related to the study but not to any of the study
                  subjects.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: RSUBJID
                Section: Associated Persons
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Exclude:
      - DM

json.Description: Verify that RSUBJID=DM.USUBJID when RSUBJID is populated and RSUBJID is not equal to POOLID

Outcome.Message: RSUBJID must equal DM.USUBJID when RSUBJID is populated and RSUBJID does not equal POOLID

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Identifier for a related study subject or pool of study subjects. The subject(s) may be human or animal. RSUBJID will be populated with the USUBJID of the related subject or the POOLID of the related pool. RSUBJID will be null for data about associated persons who are related to the study but not to any of the study subjects.
